CustomField.description: NICC-028950 - Added for the Trust Incident Notifications project.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Start_Date__c), '', Text(MONTH(Start_Date__c)) &"/"& Text(DAY(Start_Date__c)) &"/"& Text(YEAR(Start_Date__c)) &" "& if (ISBLANK(Start_Time_GMT__c), '00:00', IF(CONTAINS(Start_Time_GMT__c, ':'), Start_Time_GMT__c, Start_Time_GMT__c &":00")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field that combines the Start Date and Start Time GMT fields for display in email notifications and the Trust website.
CustomField.label: Incident Start Date/Time
